"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>83032c12-f95c-4b90-a556-f776a9bbb62d#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A domború tükör</string>
            <string language="en">convex mirror</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konvexer Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir convexe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho convexo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio convesso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυρτός καθρέφτης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo convexo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A domború tükör, nevezetes sugármenetek, képalkotás</string>
            <string language="en">convex mirror, notable radius, formation of images</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">fénytan,  domború tükör,  gömbtükör,  fókusz,  képalkotás,  </string>
            <string language="en">optics,convex mirror, notable radius, formation of images</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konvexer Spiegel, bemerkenswerter Radius, 
Anordnung von Bildern</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir convexe, rayon notable, formation des 
images</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho convexo, raio notável, formação das 
imagens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio convesso, raggio notevole, formazione 
delle immagini</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυρτός καθρέφτης, ξεχωριστή ακτίνα, σχηματισμός των 
εικόνων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo convexo, radio notable, formación de 
imágenes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik, konvexer Spiegel, bemerkenswerter Radius, 
Anordnung von Bildern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systeme optique, miroir convexe, rayon notable, 
formation des images</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema ótico, espelho convexo, raio notável, 
formação das imagens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ottica, specchio convesso, raggio notevole, formazione 
delle immagini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτική, κυρτός καθρέφτης, ξεχωριστή ακτίνα, σχηματισμός 
των εικόνων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la óptica, espejo convexo, radio notable, formación 
de imágenes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

version:3.0
n:;

        <metaMetadata>

        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
